sentences.english: The brother and sister quickly ran.
Ida buried the flowers with her cousins.
sentences.chinese: 意達和她的表兄妹們把花埋了。

sentences.english: Jay and Rita are brother and sister.
I guessed that the Stapletons were the pair.
sentences.chinese: 我揣測到斯臺普頓兄妹就是要找的那對。

sentences.english: Today, brother and sister team Jim and Rosemary steer Oyster Bay.
sentences.chinese: 現在吉姆與羅絲瑪麗兄妹檔管理蠔灣。

sentences.english: The brother and sister are both students.
Tong Lin let yuan ren can not to television to the public the identity of the brother and sister.
sentences.chinese: 彤琳讓元仁誓死不得向電視臺公開兄妹的身份。

sentences.english: Summer magnum sister rides to jo jo about good place.
sentences.chinese: 夏夢龍兄妹乘車向喬喬約好的地點趕去。

sentences.english: As the brother and sister were about to rise from the table, there came a knock at the door.
sentences.chinese: 正在兄妹倆要離開桌子時，有人敲門。

sentences.english: I had a blast on New Year's Eve with my cousins.
sentences.chinese: 除夕夜那晚我和我的表兄妹們玩得很開心。

sentences.english: There is only a spat between the brother and sister.
sentences.chinese: 那只是兄妹間的小吵小鬧。

sentences.english: And this is the brother/sister case.
It's an usual rivalry between brother and sister.
sentences.chinese: 那是兄妹之間常見的鉤心鬥角。

sentences.english: A little brother and little sister were playing by a well, and while they were playing there they both fell in.
sentences.chinese: 從前有兄妹兩人在井邊玩耍，不小心掉進了井裏。

sentences.english: Sibling two people have resorted to take refuge in tears fiance peng shrimp monsters.
sentences.chinese: 兄妹二人只得去投靠秋菊的未婚夫彭蝦仔。

sentences.english: The four Pevensie children meet Prince Caspian.
sentences.chinese: 帕文西四兄妹與凱斯賓王子會合。

definition: mother and child/parent and subsidiary (companies)/principal and interest
(of siblings) having the same mother but different fathers/half (brother or sister)
(of siblings) having the same father but different mothers/half (brother or sister)
brothers/younger brother/CL:個|个[ge4]/I, me (humble term used by men in public speech)/brotherly/fraternal
